amendment.description: To provide a phased and temporary anchor movement exception for Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5016 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S9584-9585; text: CR S9584) To provide a phased and temporary anchor movement exception for Alaska.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5016 proposed by Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5016 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
